title: Supermoons and meteor showers: Five celestial events to look for this autumn
description: From supermoons to meteor showers, Elizabeth Rizzini has your guide to what may delight in the autumn night skies.
content:
Inspired by the recent total lunar eclipse? There are more celestial events to look out for this autumn as the nights start to draw in.
Whilst meteorological autumn begins every year on the same date - 1 September - the start of astronomical autumn v... [1632 chars]

title: Defiant nuns flee Austrian care home for their abandoned convent in the Alps
description: Sisters Bernadette, Regina and Rita needed a locksmith to get back into their convent, defying Church leaders.
content:

title: England opener Phil Salt wants to be 'best in the world' after record-breaking century
description: Phil Salt has set his sights on becoming the "best in the world" as a T20 opener after smashing a record-breaking century in England's 146-run victory over South Africa.
content:
Phil Salt has set his sights on becoming the "best in the world" as a T20 opener after smashing a record-breaking century in England's 146-run victory over South Africa.

title: Records tumble as Phil Salt’s stunning century leads England to T20 rout of South Africa
description: England made history, and for the first time more than 300 runs, to thump South Africa in the second Twenty20 at Old Trafford
content: England made history, and for the first time more than 300 runs, on an extraordinary night in Manchester as they buried South Africa under a mountain of runs and shredded statistics. Their highest T20 total was turbocharged by a brilliant opening sta... [4279 chars]
